title: Hogleifa
text: The Hogleifa is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> in the <a href="Bernese%20Alps">Bernese Alps</a>, overlooking the <a href="L%C3%B6tschental">Lötschental</a> in the canton of <a href="Valais">Valais</a>. It lies at the western end of the <a href="Bietschhorn">Bietschhorn</a>-<a href="Aletschhorn">Aletschhorn</a> chain.
